column12: This district contains two subdistricts: inside the floodway and ouside the floodway but inside the flood plain. All new structures are prohibitted inside the floodway, and any new structure build outside of the floodway but in the flood plain requires a public hearing. The treatments listed are the regulations for outside the floodway but inside the floodplain.
